cockatrice_carddatabase.cards:
First Steps ROM W W 1 Enchantment - Aura 1 Enchant creature When First Steps enters the battlefield, put a vigilance counter on enchanted creature. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each different kind of counter on it.
Neighborhood Watch ROM W 1W 2 Creature - Human Warrior 2/1 2 First strike mod (This creature enters the battlefield with a first strike counter. When it dies, you may put its counters on target artifact or creature.)
Spontaneous Flight ROM W 2W 3 Instant 3 Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Put a flying counter on it.
Atares Aegis ROM W 1W 2 Artifact - Vehicle 1 Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or greater: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)
Cyberhawk ROM W 5W 6 Artifact Creature - Bird Construct 3/4 2 Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs 1 less to cast for each artifact you control.) Flying
Cloud Droid ROM W 2W 3 Artifact Creature - Construct 2/1 2 Flying Whenever another artifact enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.
Crisis Response Team ROM W 3W 4 Creature - Human 3/2 2 Lifelink mod (This creature enters the battlefield with a lifelink counter. When it dies, you may put its counters on target artifact or creature.)
Rooftop Rebel ROM W 1W 2 Creature - Human Rebel 1/1 2 When Rooftop Rebel enters the battlefield, arm it. (Create a colorless Equipment artifact token named Weapon with equip 2 and “Equipped creature gets +1/+1” attached to this creature.)
N-FORCE Gunner ROM W 2W 3 Creature - Human Soldier 1/1 2 When N-FORCE Gunner enters the battlefield, arm it. (Create a colorless Equipment artifact token named Weapon with equip 2 and “Equipped creature gets +1/+1” attached to this creature.) At the beginning of combat on your turn, target equipped creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Disposal Droid ROM W 2WW 4 Artifact Creature - Construct 3/3 2 Overcharge (You may upload a card from your hand as you cast this spell. It’s exiled and its owner may pay 2 to put it into their hand anytime they could cast a sorcery.) When Disposal Droid enters the battlefield, if it was overcharged, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment.
Resolute Pilot ROM W 2W 3 Creature - Human Pilot 2/2 2 Whenever Resolute Pilot becomes tapped, tap target creature an opponent controls.
Redistribute Matter ROM W 4W 5 Instant 3 Exile target creature. Each player draws a card.
CyCorp Engineer ROM U 1U 2 Creature - Human Advisor 1/3 2 T: Add C. Spend this mana only to cast an artifact spell or to pay an upload cost.
Server Farm ROM
3 3 Artifact 1 When Server Farm enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a card named Server Farm, upload it, then shuffle your library. (To upload a card, exile it. Its owner may pay 2 to return it to their hand any time they could cast a sorcery.) T: Add one mana of any color.
Strider Droid ROM U 5U 6 Artifact Creature - Construct 4/4 2 Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Data Leak ROM U 1U 2 Instant 3 Overcharge (You may upload a card from your hand as you cast this spell. It’s exiled and its owner may pay 2 to put it into their hand anytime they could cast a sorcery.) Counter target spell unless its controller pays 2. If this spell was overcharged, instead counter that spell unless they pay 3.
Select ROM U U 1 Instant 3 Choose one — • Draw a card. • Put an uploaded card you own into your hand, then upload the top card of your library. (To upload a card, exile it. Its owner may pay 2 to return it to their hand any time they could cast a sorcery.)
Veteran Hacker ROM U U 1 Creature - Human Rogue 1/2 2 Veteran Hacker can’t be blocked.
Hovership ROM U 4U 5 Artifact Creature - Construct 3/2 2 Flying When Hovership enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Repulsor Droid ROM U 3U 4 Artifact Creature - Construct 3/3 2 Overcharge (You may upload a card from your hand as you cast this spell. It’s exiled and its owner may pay 2 to put it into their hand anytime they could cast a sorcery.) When Repulsor Droid enters the battlefield, if it was overcharged, you may return target creature to its owner’s hand.
Counter-Hacker ROM U 1U 2 Artifact Creature - Construct Rogue 2/1 2 Whenever an uploaded card is put into your hand, Counter-Hacker gets +1/+1 until end of turn and can’t be blocked this turn.
Wing Trooper ROM U 2U 3 Creature - Human Soldier 2/1 2 Flying mod (This creature enters the battlefield with a flying counter. When it dies, you may put its counters on target artifact or creature.)
Thoughtcast ROM U 4U 5 Sorcery 3 Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs 1 less to cast for each artifact you control.) Draw two cards.
Search String ROM U 1U 2 Sorcery 3 Draw a card. Upload the top card of your library. (To upload a card, exile it. Its owner may pay 2 to return it to their hand any time they could cast a sorcery.)
Elysium Rig ROM U 1UU 3 Artifact 1 When Elysium Rig enters the battlefield, tap target creature. It doesn’t untap during its controller’s untap step as long as you control Elysium Rig.
Scion Mark V ROM B 3B 4 Artifact - Vehicle 1 When Scion Mark V enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or greater: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)
Bad Driver ROM B B 1 Creature - Human Pilot 1/2 2 Whenever Bad Driver becomes tapped, each player loses 1 life.
Terminator Droid ROM B 2B 3 Artifact Creature - Construct 3/2 2 Menace mod (This creature enters the battlefield with a menace counter. When it dies, you may put its counters on target artifact or creature.)
Net Loss ROM B B 1 Instant 3 Overcharge (You may upload a card from your hand as you cast this spell. It’s exiled and its owner may pay 2 to put it into their hand anytime they could cast a sorcery.) Target player uploads a creature they control. If this spell was overcharged, instead that player sacrifices a creature.
Desperate Living ROM B B 1 Instant 3 Target creature gets +1/+2 until end of turn. Put a lifelink counter on it.
Trash Fire ROM R 2R 3 Sorcery 3 Mill six cards. When you do, choose one — • Destroy target artifact. • Trash Fire deals damage to each opponent equal to the number of artifact cards in your graveyard.
Red Pill ROM R R 1 Sorcery 3 As an additional cost to cast Red Pill, upload a creature you control. (To upload a card, exile it. Its owner may pay 2 to return it to their hand any time they could cast a sorcery.) Add RRR.
Scrap Scrabbler ROM B 1B 2 Artifact Creature - Crab Construct 2/2 2 2B: Upload Scrap Scrabbler from your graveyard. (To upload a card, exile it. Its owner may pay 2 to return it to their hand any time they could cast a sorcery.)
Pterodroid ROM B 3B 4 Artifact Creature - Construct 2/3 2 Flying When Pterodroid enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice an artifact. If you do, you draw a card and lose 1 life.
Fleshgrafter ROM B 2B 3 Creature - Human Warrior 2/2 2 Discard an artifact card: Fleshgrafter gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
Divest ROM B B 1 Sorcery 3 Target player reveals their hand. You choose an artifact or creature card from it. That player discards that card.
Costly Defeat ROM B 2BB 4 Instant 3 Remove up to one counter from target creature, then destroy it.
Heaps Hoarder ROM B 4B 5 Creature - Mutant 4/4 2 When Heaps Hoarder enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life for each artifact card in your graveyard.
Undermarket Merchant ROM R 1R 2 Creature - Lizard Mutant 2/2 2 Sacrifice an artifact: Add R. Activate this ability only once per turn.
System Shock ROM R 1R 2 Instant 3 System Shock deals 2 damage to any target. Put a menace counter on a creature you control. (It can’t be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Cyborg Duelist ROM R R 1 Artifact Creature - Human Construct 1/1 2 First strike mod (This creature enters the battlefield with a first strike counter. When it dies, you may put its counters on target artifact or creature.)
Junkyard Enforcer ROM R 2R 3 Creature - Human Warrior 2/3 2 Sacrifice an artifact: Junkyard Enforcer gets +2/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.
Neural Short ROM R 2R 3 Instant 3 Overcharge (You may upload a card from your hand as you cast this spell. It’s exiled and its owner may pay 2 to put it into their hand anytime they could cast a sorcery.) Neural Short deals 3 damage to target creature. If this spell was overcharged, it deals 6 damage instead.
Saurian Sawyer ROM R 1R 2 Creature - Lizard Mutant Warrior 1/2 2 When Saurian Sawyer enters the battlefield, arm it. (Create a colorless Equipment artifact token named Weapon with equip 2 and “Equipped creature gets +1/+1” attached to this creature.) As long as Saurian Sawyer is equipped, it attacks each turn if able.
Armed to the Teeth ROM R 3R 4 Instant 3 Arm target creature you control, then arm it again. (To arm a creature, create a colorless Equipment artifact token named Weapon with equip 2 and “Equipped creature gets +1/+1” attached to that creature.)
Splice Soldier ROM G 4G 5 Creature - Rhino Mutant Soldier 5/4 2 Trample mod (This creature enters the battlefield with a trample counter. When it dies, you may put its counters on target artifact or creature.)
Compiler Droid ROM R 2R 3 Artifact Creature - Construct 1/3 2 Defender, reach T: Compiler Droid deals 1 damage to each opponent. Whenever you put an uploaded card into your hand, untap Compiler Droid.
Feral Taxon ROM R 3R 4 Creature - Lizard Mutant 2/1 2 When Feral Taxon enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 red Lizard Mutant creature token. Other Mutants you control get +1/+0.
Stoker Droid ROM R 4R 5 Artifact Creature - Construct 4/4 2 Overcharge (You may upload a card from your hand as you cast this spell. It’s exiled and its owner may pay 2 to put it into their hand anytime they could cast a sorcery.) When Stoker Droid enters the battlefield, if it was overcharged, it deals 2 damage to target creature.
Towering Hybrid ROM G 3G 4 Creature - Mutant 2/4 2 Reach mod (This creature enters the battlefield with a reach counter. When it dies, you may put its counters on target artifact or creature.)
Refuge Sentinel ROM G 2G 3 Creature - Mutant Warrior 3/2 2 Vigilance mod (This creature enters the battlefield with a vigilance counter. When it dies, you may put its counters on target artifact or creature.)
Primal Programming ROM G 1G 2 Sorcery 3 Overcharge (You may upload a card from your hand as you cast this spell. It’s exiled and its owner may pay 2 to put it into their hand anytime they could cast a sorcery.) Target creature you control gets +2/+2 until end of turn if this spell was overcharged. Then it fights target creature you don’t control.
Stabilizer Droid ROM G 4GG 6 Artifact Creature - Construct 6/6 2 When Stabilizer Droid enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.
Genetic Symbiote ROM G 1G 2 Creature - Mutant 0/3 2 T: Untap another target Mutant or land you control. Activate this ability only during your turn.
Soylent Reaper ROM G 3G 4 Artifact Creature - Construct 3/4 2 Overcharge (You may upload a card from your hand as you cast this spell. It’s exiled and its owner may pay 2 to put it into their hand anytime they could cast a sorcery.) When Soylent Reaper enters the battlefield, if it was overcharged, search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
Terrain Scanner ROM G G 1 Artifact 1 T, Sacrifice Terrain Scanner: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may put a land card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.
Foster Guardian ROM G 2G 3 Creature - Mutant 2/2 2 When Foster Guardian enters the battlefield, return target permanent card with mana value 1 or less from your graveyard to your hand.
Enhance ROM G 1G 2 Instant 3 Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. You may move any number of counters onto it from among creatures you control.
Privileged Elite ROM G 1G 2 Creature - Human 2/2 2 When Privileged Elite enters the battlefield, if you have at least 20 life, draw a card.
Naturalize ROM G 1G 2 Instant 3 Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
